description: This walk visits the attractive Balgray Reservoir in Barrhead. You can start the walk from the car park at the eastern end of the water on Balgraystone Road. From here you can pick up footpaths heading along the southern side of the water and along the Brock Burn. You can extend the walk by visiting the adjacent Ryat Linn and Waulkmill Reservoirs. There's more nice footpaths here and some woodland trails too. On the walk look out for a variety of water loving birds on the reservoir.
